title: High Temperature Domineering Positions
abstract:
Domineering is a partizan game where two players have a collection of
dominoes which they place on the grid in turn, covering up squares. One player
places tiles vertically, while the other places them horizontally; the first
player who cannot move loses. It has been conjectured that the highest
temperature possible in Domineering is 2. We have developed a program that
enables a parallel exhaustive search of Domineering positions with temperatures
close to or equal to 2 to allow for analysis of such positions
